narrative.title: 1Re Brigade Fran Aise Libre - 1942Q1
narrative.situation: French Free French Infantry Brigade deployed in North Africa during 1942Q1.
narrative.objectives: Independent defensive brigade under British XXX Corps command. Specialized in desert warfare with strong defensive capabilities. Multi-national composition (French, Spanish Republicans, colonial troops from Africa and Pacific).
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: Rocky desert with wadis - Bir Hakeim position sits on low rocky plateau

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Desert warfare experience from Syrian and Eritrean campaigns
Combined arms coordination with limited resources
Multi-national integration (French Foreign Legion includes Spanish Republicans)

environment.terrain_type: Rocky desert with wadis - Bir Hakeim position sits on low rocky plateau
